title: Do you really think "Leaver buster" was reasonable?
body:
I've been playing LoL for 4 years. 
LoL changed a lot since then, i must admit theres alot of cool new updates and regulations but THE MOST USELESS AND UNREASONABLE UPDATE WAS "_LEAVER BUSTER_". 

My main acc which I uses to play for the late 4 years got demoted to bronze, got leaver buster level 3rd and has to wait for 20 MINUTES just to queue just because internet problem so i just made a new acc and start over. I've spent alot of time and money in that acc and it all come to waste, lol. And just now my new acc got "leaver buster" warning again cause i was playing in a cafe and got internet problem! I mean whats the point of this? 

Riot if youre reading this you just make people lost interest in League of Legends not make it better. 
People leave game not because they wanted to, alot of player gotten into different situation like internet problems etc and you just make a system that banned our acc like we were a robot player without feelings. Do you know our frustation when we got dced? how hard we try to get back into the game but we cant? how many times we restart the computer just to get back to the game and when we has to wait a couple minutes just to queue which if it happen again goes up to 20 mins? 

Yo riot, people got dced everyday not because they wanted to. If you really wanted to make things right just leave it to their teammates. They can report the leaver themself! Theres no need to make a system that banned people just because technical problem happen Jesus.. 

> If you got hit by a car by accident and then the police put you in jail while youre injured everywhere instead of the driver, would you be happy?

replies.body:
> If you got hit by a car by accident and then the police put you in jail while youre injured everywhere instead of the driver, would you be happy?

Actually, the more apt comparison would be that you're playing in a football match with nine other players, five versus five. However, you didn't sleep well that night because of the noise your neighbour keeps making and you decide to leave the game early to get some shut-eye.

The nine who were playing with you now have to play 4 versus 5, which isn't entirely balanced and they don't enjoy the game as much as they could have. (Maybe the five guys who're winning.)

You pull this behaviour consistently, even if it's never really your fault. (You get called away because your dad's in the hospital, you have to leave because your dog died, you quit halfway because of a stomach ulcer...)

After doing this for the tenth time, you show up to play and the people there all tell you they don't want to play with you because you consistently ruin the game for everyone by leaving repeatedly.

Does it matter that it's never your fault when you abandon the game and leave nine people in the lurch? It doesn't. You're still negatively affecting everyone you play with on a consistent basis.
A much more realistic comparison than the Op's, as well as being very well written.

The [lower priority queue](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) should allow you time to troubleshoot any issues that might cause an interruption.  Leaves cause a negative experience for other players regardless of intent, and places you in a lower priority queue only after consistently leaving matches.  If you are experiencing connection issues at a public venue, please reach out to the cafe-owner to look into this.  Creating new accounts will only cause them to receive a lower priority queue as well as continue creating negative experiences for newer players.
